text: @RahulGandhi So what? When the Tablighis were in spreading spree you chose to keep mum thinking of Vote Bank Khatra.. Whether Covid-19 case is 1 or 1 Crore you are not going to do any service to the nation so just shut up feed crumbs to your piddis through zoom.
